summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to the Stormwater, Grading, and Drainage Control Code, as adopted by Ordinance 116425 and amended by Ordinances 117432, 117697, 117789, and 118396; amending Chapter 22.800, entitled "Title, Purpose, Scope, and Authority"; amending Chapter 22.801, entitled "Definitions"; amending Chapter 22.802, entitled "Stormwater, Drainage, and Erosion Control"; amending Chapter 22.804, entitled "Grading"; and amending Chapter 22.808, entitled "Administration and Enforcement."
committee: Water Resources, Solid Waste and Public Health
